snippet: Ice Hot, a festival of Nordic dance opening on Wednesday at the Joyce Theater, will expose New York audiences to contemporary dance from Denmark, Norway and Finland.
abstract: Ice Hot, festival of Nordic dance opening at Joyce Theater, will expose New York audiences to contemporary dance from Denmark, Norway and Finland; program will feature three major Scandinavian dance companies including Danish Dance Theater, Carte Blanche from Norway and choreographer Tero Saarinen's troupe from Finland.
lead_paragraph: Ice Hot, a festival of Nordic dance opening on Wednesday at the Joyce Theater, will expose New York audiences to contemporary dance from Denmark, Norway and Finland.

headline.seo: Ice Hot, at the Joyce Theater, Features Nordic Dance Troupes
headline.main: Incoming, From the North, a Blizzard of Fresh Dance
headline.print_headline: Incoming, From the North, A Blizzard of Fresh Dance
